context: Block connects Square seller ecosystem with Cash App consumer platform. The company is a major Bitcoin holder and developer, with Afterpay BNPL and TIDAL music streaming.

competitors.name: PayPal
competitors.notes: Major payments competitor across consumer and merchant

competitors.name: Shopify
competitors.notes: Commerce platform competing in SMB payments

competitors.name: Fiserv/Clover
competitors.notes: Major payment processor with SMB POS

competitors.name: Coinbase
competitors.notes: Crypto platform competing in Bitcoin services

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Tap to Pay and wallet competing with Square hardware
